comment.author: 53569869@N04
comment._content:
Looks like a young Robert Downey Jr!
His coat looks like it was meant for a five yr old boy...poor thing.
I wonder how many of these children and even many of the older "criminals" were happy to be caught so they'd have a roof over their head, a blanket at night and a bit of food each day...for a month or so.
